content: back of it sl 1 slip one stitch kwise knitwise pwise purlwise ssk slip slip knit see below p2tog purl two stitches together slip slip knit slip 2 stitches knitwise or knitwise followed by purlwise one at a time insert tip of left needle into stitches from above put yarn round right needle and knit both stitches together © frankie brown 2011 my patterns are for personal use only and should not be used to knit items for sale
